Sentencas: A semiconductor heterostructure material based on p-type cubic perovskite Ba0.9K0.1Fe0.5Co0.5O3-delta (BKFC) and n -type fluorite Sm0.075Nd0.075Ce0.85O2-delta (SNDC) forms micro p-n junctions in the low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (LT-SOFCs) improving the electrochemical performance.
Titulo: A heterostructure p-n junction constituting of fluorite and perovskite semiconductors for electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: A highly power density of 911 mW & BULL;cm- 2 at 550 C was obtained with this material combination as electrolyte in a fuel cell, which is 20 % higher than that of the LT-SOFCs with pure BKFC as electrolyte.
Titulo: A heterostructure p-n junction constituting of fluorite and perovskite semiconductors for electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: An ionic conductivity of 0.14 S & BULL;cm- 1 at 550 C was achieved when equal amounts of BKFC and SNDC were employed as the electrolyte.
Titulo: A heterostructure p-n junction constituting of fluorite and perovskite semiconductors for electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: Profound analysis of the heterostructure p-n junction shows that it blocks electron transport through mixed electronic and ionic conductor and enhances ionic transport improving the electrochemical performance of the fuel cell.
Titulo: A heterostructure p-n junction constituting of fluorite and perovskite semiconductors for electrochemical energy conversion

Sentencas: The BKFC-SNDC composite electrolyte materials is a potential electrolyte material for raising the power density of fuel cells at lower temperatures.
Titulo: A heterostructure p-n junction constituting of fluorite and perovskite semiconductors for electrochemical energy conversion
